headline: Tesla Shares Leap After Musk Makes $1 Billion Stock Purchase
summary: Shares in Tesla (TSLA) jumped in premarket trading after Elon Musk disclosed his first purchase of the stock in the open market since February 2020. Teslaâ€™s CEO purchased more than 2.5 million shares in the company on Friday, totaling around $1 billion, according to a regulatory filing on Monday.
